title: Perfect Pour Over Coffee
extended_details: A system that automates the process of pour over coffee. This system will automate pouring hot water over the ground coffee while grinding and heating water are left for the user to do. Different variables of this system can be adjusted on the fly such as bloom time, brew time, and pouring patterns.
